Death (Age of Sigmar) [4,670pts]

  • **Pitched Battle** 2,000 (Death: Legions of Nagash and Nighthaunt) [4,670pts]

    Rules: Muster Abilities, Returning Slain Models - Nighthaunt

    • Leader [3,730pts]

      • Abhorrant Archregent [240pts]

        Categories: ABHORRANT, ABHORRANT ARCHREGENT, DEATH, FLESH-EATER COURTS, HERO, VAMPIRE, WIZARD, Leader

        Command Abilities: Summon Imperial Guard, Magic: Abhorrant Archregent, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Ferocious Hunger, Mystic Shield, Unit: Abhorrant Archregent, Weapon: Gory Talons and Fangs


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Summon Imperial Guard You can use this command ability at the end of your movement phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly model that has this command ability and has not used it before in the battle. That model summons 1 of the following units to the battlefield: 1 COURTIER; or 1 unit of up to 3 KNIGHTS; or 1 unit of up to 20 SERFS. The summoned unit is added to your army, and must be set up wholly within 6" of the edge of the battlefield and more than 9" from any enemy units.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Abhorrant Archregent 2/2Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Ferocious Hunger
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Ferocious Hunger 6If successfully cast, pick 1 friendly FLESH‐EATER COURTS unit wholly within 24" of the caster and visible to them, and roll a D3. Add the roll to the Attacks characteristic of melee weapons used by that unit until your next hero phase.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Abhorrant Archregent 67104
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Gory Talons and Fangs Melee1"73+3+-11

      • Abhorrant Ghoul King on Royal Zombie Dragon [440pts]

        Categories: VAMPIRE, MONSTER, HERO, WIZARD, ABHORRANT GHOUL KING, DEATH, FLESH-EATER COURTS, ABHORRANT, ROYAL ZOMBIE DRAGON, Leader, Behemoth

        Command Abilities: Summon Royal Courtier, Magic: Abhorrant Ghoul King on Royal Zombie Dragon, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Malefic Hunger, Mystic Shield, Unit: Abhorrant Ghoul King on Royal Zombie Dragon, Unit Abilities: Fly, Pestilential Breath, Royal Blood, Weapon: Gory Talons and Fangs, Pestilential Breath, Snapping Maw, Sword-like Claws, Zombie Dragon's Wound Table: 00-03, 04-06, 07-09, 10-12, 13+


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Summon Royal Courtier You can use this command ability at the end of your movement phase. If you do so, pick 1 friendly model that has this command ability and has not used it before in the battle. That model summons 1 Courtier unit to the battlefield. The summoned unit is added to your army, and must be set up wholly within 6" of the edge of the battlefield and more than 9" from any enemy units.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Abhorrant Ghoul King on Royal Zombie Dragon 1/1This model is a Wizard. It can attempt to cast one spell in your hero phase, and attempt to unbind one spell in the enemy hero phase. It knows the Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield and Malefic Hunger spells.
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Malefic Hunger 6If successfully cast, until your next hero phase you can re-roll wound rolls for attacks made with melee weapons by friendly Flesh‐eater Courts units wholly within 16" of the caster.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.

        Fly This unit can fly.
        Pestilential Breath When you attack with this model’s Pestilential Breath, roll a dice before making the hit roll for the attack. If the roll is less than or equal to the number of models in the target unit, the attack scores a hit without needing to make a hit roll.
        Royal Blood In your hero phase, you can heal up to D3 wounds allocated to this model.

      • Crypt Haunter Courtier [120pts]

        Categories: MORDANT, HERO, COURTIER, CRYPT HAUNTER COURTIER, DEATH, FLESH-EATER COURTS, Leader

        Unit: Crypt Haunter Courtier, Unit Abilities: Chosen of the King, Muster King's Chosen, Noble Blood, Weapon: Massive Bone Club, Rancid Talons


        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Crypt Haunter Courtier 7"6104+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Chosen of the King You can re-roll hit rolls for attacks made by this model while it is within 18" of any friendly ABHORRANTS.
        Muster King's Chosen In your hero phase, roll 6 dice for each friendly CRYPT HAUNTER COURTIER on the battlefield. For each 5+ you can return 1 slain model to a friendly CRYPT HORRORS unit that is within 10" of that CRYPT HAUNTER COURTIER. Slain models can be returned to more than one unit if you wish, but each successful dice roll can only be used to return a model to a single unit.
        Noble Blood In your hero phase, you can heal 1 wound allocated to this model.
        Weapon TypeRangeAttacksTo HitTo WoundRendDamage Ref
        Massive Bone Club Melee1"34+3+-3
        Rancid Talons Melee1"24+3+-1

        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Dreadblade Harrow ----
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Curse of Loyalty Re-roll wound rolls of 1 for attacks made with this model's Dreadblade while it is within 9" of a friendly KNIGHT OF SHROUDS.
        Ethereal Ignore modifiers (positive or negative) when making save rolls for this unit.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Phantasmal Discorporation If this model is more than 3" from any enemy models at the start of your movement phase, instead of making a normal move, you an remove it from the battlefield and then set it up anywhere on the battlefield more than 9" from any enemy models.

        Kurdoss Valentian, the Craven King 6"7104+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Ethereal Ignore modifiers (positive or negative) when making save rolls for this unit.
        Fly This unit can fly.

        If I Cannot Rule, None Shall Rule! At the start of the enemy hero phase, after the opposing player receives their comand point for that turn, roll a dice. On a 5+, subtract 1 from the enemy player's command points, to a minimum of 0, and you receive 1 command point.
        Soul-crushing Smite If the unmodified wound roll for an attack made with the Sepulchral Sceptre is 6, that attack has a Damage Characteristic of D6 instead of D3.

      • Lady Olynder, Mortarch of Grief [220pts]

        Categories: DEATH, MALIGNANT, NIGHTHAUNT, HERO, WIZARD, MORTARCH, LADY OLYNDER, Leader

        Command Abilities: No Rest for the Wicked, Magic: Lady Olynder, Mortarch of Grief, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Grief-stricken, Mystic Shield, Unit: Lady Olynder, Mortarch of Grief, Unit Abilities: Ethereal, Fly, Grave-sands of Time, Lifting the Veil (ROLL D6), Mortarch of Grief, Wail of the Damned, Weapon: Staff of Midnight


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        No Rest for the Wicked You can use this command ability in your hero phase if this model is your general and is on the battlefield. If you do so, you can return 1 slain model to each friendly SUMMONABLE NIGHTHAUNT unit that is within 12" of a friendly model with this command ability.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Lady Olynder, Mortarch of Grief 2/2Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Grief-stricken
        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Arcane Bolt 5If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. That unit suffers 1 mortal wound. If the casting roll was 10 or more, the unit suffers D3 mortal wounds instead.
        Grief-stricken 7If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit that is within 18" of the caster and visible to them. Until your next hero phase, subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by that unit and add 1 to hit rolls for attacks made with melee weapons that target that unit.
        Mystic Shield 6If successfully cast, pick a friendly unit within 18" of the caster that is visible to them. Re-roll save rolls of 1 for that unit until your next hero phase.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Lady Olynder, Mortarch of Grief 6"7104+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Ethereal Ignore modifiers (positive or negative) when making save rolls for this unit.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Frightful Touch If the unmodified roll for an attack made with the <Banshee Mandmaidens' Spectral Claws>, <Wraith Herald's Spectral Claws>, <Fellreaper>, <Reaper Scythe> <Chill Dagger> <Spectral Scythe> <Cairn Wraith's Reaper Scythe> <Spectral Claws and Daggers> <Spectral Host's Ethereal Weapons>, <Mourngul's Nightmarish Claws and Fangs> is 6, that attack inflicts <the weapon damage as a> mortal wound and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
        Grave-sands of Time Once per battle, in your pero phase, you can choose either to inflict D6 mortal sounds on an enemy HERO within 6" of this model, or heal D6 wounds that have been allocated to this model.
        Lifting the Veil (ROLL D6) At the start of your hero phase, pick an enemy unit within 12" of this model and that is visible to her and roll a dice. On a 1, nothing happens. On a 2+ that unit suffers a number of mortal wounds equal to the roll. Inaddition, if any enemy models are slain by this ability, immediately heal D3 wounds that have been allocated to this model.
        Mortarch of Grief Add 1 to the number of models that flee from enemy units that fail a battleshock test while they are within 12" of this model.
        Wail of the Damned At the start of your shooting phase, roll 2D6 for each enemy unit within 10" of this model. If the roll for the unit is higher than its Bravery characteristic, it suffers D3 mortal wounds.

        Ethereal Ignore modifiers (positive or negative) when making save rolls for this unit.

        Staring Death in the Face At the start of the combat phase, you can pick an enemy HERO within 3" of this model. Subtract 1 from hit rolls for attacks made by that HERO in that combat phase.

        Mortarch of Night If Mannfred successfully cast any spells during your hero phase, you can add 1 to all hit and wound rolls for Gheistvor until your next hero phase.
        Sword of Unholy Power If Mannfred causes any wounds to be allocated using Gheistvor in the combat phase, you can add 1 to the next casting or unbinding roll you make for Mannfred.

        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Supreme Lord of Death If Nagash uses this ability, then until your next hero phase you can re-roll hit and save rolls of 1 for all friendly DEATH units. In addition, do not take battleshock tests for DEATH units affected by this ability.
        Magic Cast/UnbindSpells Known Ref
        Nagash 3/3 *Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Hand of Dust and Soul Stealer spells, as well as any spells known by other DEATH WIZARDS on the battlefield

        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Hand of Dust 8If successfully cast, pick an enemy model within 3" the caster. Then, take a dice and hide it in one of your hands. Your opponent must pick one of your hands. If they pick the one holding the dice, the spell has no effect. If they pick the empty hand, the enemy model is slain.
        Soul Stealer 6If successfully cast, pick an enemy unit within 24" of the caster that is visible to them and roll two dice. If the total is greater than that unit’s Bravery characteristic, it suffers D3 mortal wounds. If the total is at least double the unit’s Bravery, it suffers D6 mortal wounds instead. For each mortal wound inflicted on the target, heal 1 wound that has been allocated to the caster.
        Unit MoveWoundsBraverySave Ref
        Nagash, Supreme Lord of the Undead 9"16103+
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Death Magic Incarnate You can re-roll any of the D3 rolls when using Nagash’s Deathly Invocation ability (above).
        Deathly Invocation At the start of your hero phase, pick up to 5 different friendly SUMMONABLE units on the battlefield. You can heal D3 wounds that have been allocated to each unit you picked (roll separately for each unit). If no wounds are currently allocated to a unit you picked, you may instead return a number of slain models to it that have a combined Wounds characteristic equal to or less than the roll of a D3.
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Frightful Touch If the unmodified roll for an attack made with the <Banshee Mandmaidens' Spectral Claws>, <Wraith Herald's Spectral Claws>, <Fellreaper>, <Reaper Scythe> <Chill Dagger> <Spectral Scythe> <Cairn Wraith's Reaper Scythe> <Spectral Claws and Daggers> <Spectral Host's Ethereal Weapons>, <Mourngul's Nightmarish Claws and Fangs> is 6, that attack inflicts <the weapon damage as a> mortal wound and the attack sequence ends (do not make a wound or save roll).
        Morikane Each time a mortal wound is allocated to Nagash, roll a dice. On a 4+ the mortal wound is negated. On a 6+ the attacking unit also suffers a mortal wound.
        The Nine Books of Nagash The Nine Books of Nagash allow him to cast extra spells in your hero phase, and unbind extra spells in the enemy hero phase. The number of extra spells he can attempt to cast or unbind is shown on the damage table above.
        The Staff of Power Add Alakanash’s modifier (listed in the damage table) to casting and unbinding rolls for Nagash.

      • Prince Vhordrai [480pts]

        Categories: DEATH, VAMPIRE, ZOMBIE DRAGON, MONSTER, HERO, WIZARD, PRINCE VHORDRAI, SOULBLIGHT, Leader, Behemoth

        Command Abilities: Fist of Nagash, Magic: Prince Vhordrai, Spell: Arcane Bolt, Mystic Shield, Quickblood, Unit: Prince Vhordrai, Unit Abilities: Bloodlance Charge, Breath of Shyish, Chalice of Blood, Deathly Invocation, Fly, The Hunger, Vhordrai's Wounds Suffered: 00-03, 04-06, 07-09, 10-12, 13+, Weapon: Bloodlance, Shordemaire's Maw, Shordemaire's Sword-like Claws


        Command Abilities Command Ability Details Ref
        Fist of Nagash If Prince Vhordrai uses this ability, pick a friendly DEATH HEROwithin 14" of him (you cannot choose Prince Vhordrai). That hero can immediately either be chosen to pile in and attack as if it were the combat phase, or if it is a WIZARD, attempt to cast a spell in addition to any others they can attempt to cast this phase. The same unit cannot be picked to benefit from this command ability more than once per hero phase. *ERRATA Jun'18*

      • Endless Spell: Suffocating﻿﻿ Gravetide﻿ [20pts]

        Categories: ENDLESS SPELL, SHYISH, SUFFOCATING GRAVETIDE, Malign Sorcery

        Spell: Summon Suffocating﻿﻿ Gravetide﻿, Unit Abilities: Empowered by Shyish, Fly, Necrotic Tide, Predatory, Pulled to the Grave, Rolling Barricade


        Spell Casting ValueDescription Ref
        Summon Suffocating﻿﻿ Gravetide﻿ 6If successfully cast, set up a Suffocating Gravetide model wholly within 4" of the caster.
        Unit Abilities Ability Details Ref
        Empowered by Shyish If your battle is taking place in the Realm of Death, this model can move up to 12" instead of 8".
        Fly This unit can fly.
        Necrotic Tide When this model is set up, the player who set it up can immediately make a move with it.
        Predatory A Suffocating Gravetide is a predatory endless spell. It can move up to 8" and can fly.
        Pulled to the Grave After this model has moved, each unit that has any models it passed across suffers D3 mortal wounds. In addition, subtract 1 from the Bravery characteristic of each unit that has any models it passed across until the end of the battle round.
        Rolling Barricade When a missile weapon targets a unit that has all of its models within 1" of this model, the target unit receives the benefit of cover if the attacking unit is closer to this model than it is to the target unit.

Force Rules

Muster Abilities: Several Flesh-eater Courts units have Muster abilities, such as Muster Royal Guard, that allow you to return slain models to a unit. If you use a Muster ability, set up the returning models one at a time within 1" of a model from the unit they are returning to (this can be a model returned earlier in that phase). The models can only be set up within 3" of an enemy unit if any models from their unit are already within 3" of that enemy unit. (Battletome: Flesh-eater Courts p75)

Returning Slain Models - Nighthaunt: Several Nighthaunt abilities allow you to return slain models to a unit. When you do so, set up the models one at a time within 1" of a model from the unit they are returning to (this can be a model you returned to the unit earlier in the same phase).

The slain models you return to a unit can only be set up withi 3" of an enemy unit if one or more models from the unit they are returning to are already within 3" of an enemy unit. (Battletome: Nighthaunt)
